item.description:
NOTE: We have TWO events this same date.
1. Regular Conversation Meetup at Starbucks (this one)
2. A Slide Lecture on the History of Roxbury, at the Dudley Square Library in Roxbury at 6p
-The Slide Lecture will be posted separately-

Englsih Conversation:
MEET at STARBUCKS Coffee shop!!! NOT at the LIBRARY!

The group will meet across the street from the Boston Public Library, at STARBUCKS coffee shop, 755 Boylston St between Exeter St and Fairfield St. 617-450-0310

They have tables inside and outside, we will choose a table when we get there. Look for smiling faces! If you're first to arrive, please pick a table and look out for people looking for the group.

It's a coffee shop, so refreshments are available to buy yourself if you want to.

-If there is something you'd like to practice, please bring it, or suggest an activity.

-If you arrive before 6:30 and don't see anyone else, please choose a table and welcome everyone as we arrive.

PS
We need more Organizers to help the group meet more often!
Please email the organizer if you'd like to help or suggest a meeting.

---------

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston English as a Second Language March Meeting
